thread.section_title: Store DJ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Store DJ | storedj.com.au | 2 of 410
thread.title: EJ

author: EJ
title: EJ
text: I'm never a fan of dealing with gear questions over the phone, so I went in to their Brisbane store. I'm very glad that I did. Mark was superb- fantastic to deal with and was patient to hear out my gear concerns/goals and helped me find some solutions, even when I know some of my questions were so vague and generalist he probably wanted to stick a fork in his eye. Shane also provided some excellent advice and comic relief. I may be forced to bake some brownies and take them in as a thankyou, but I'm pretty sure they won't want me back in there for a while :-) Thanks Gents, super happy with my Amaze-Ball and the other bits and pieces.
